name: PRO MUD TYRES OFFROAD
description:
Try all the heavy vehicles on OFFROAD terrain! There is no limit just the rought roads and slippery ground! Test yourself in this difficult terrain. Explore the roads and make sure do not get stuck. Take this challenge and defeat! if it gets jammed, you can call for rescue.

Features:

- Offroad experience
- Slippery ground
- Difficult terrain
- Heavy vehicles
